name: Drag-and-Drop Upload
description:
Test drag-and-drop file upload functionality

**Resultado Esperado:**
File uploads successfully with progress bar and success message

**Datos de Prueba:**
Valid CSV: 1,000 contacts; 50,000 contacts; 250,000 contacts

steps.name: Click on "Drag and drop your CSV file here"  | 2. Drag CSV file to drop zone | 3. Drop file | 4. Verify upload completion
